snippet: Nevada lawmakers are going out of their way this week to give a casino owner worth $32 billion a stadium funded on the back of taxpayers....
lead_paragraph: Nevada lawmakers are going out of their way this week to give a casino owner worth $32 billion a stadium funded on the back of taxpayers.

headline.main: Column: NFL Owners Know a Sweet Deal When They See It
